description:
There is a visual issue on Fedora 40 with KDE Plasma 6 when using the Dark Mode. The text in white on white background or grey buttons, you need to click on the field to see the text. 

The most inconvenient is the "Networks" list, as you can't scroll to see the different networks but you need to click on each of them.

Simple, easy to use, full of features, easy to configure SASL login. Can connect to many servers at once and autojoin different channels on different servers. I haven't tried all of them but this is my favourite IRC client!

Have a problem downloading files with dcc because of permission problem.
Permission denied to user home folder.
Running perfectly on lubuntu. My favourite IRC client.
I have Ubuntu 18.04, and I used it for some time. No bugs or crashes.

If the normally packaged HexChat (which is excellent) is too fast and not taking up enough space on your hard drive then this will solve that problem. Slow to launch and bloated, like an IRC client shouldn't be. Thanks snap. And thanks Ubuntu for making differentiating between proper .deb packages and snaps impossible in your graphical tools. CLI to the rescue I guess...
summary: Snap based, may not be what you want
